questions: This code makes BLOCK_SIZE * BLOCK_SIZE * ceil(size_x / TILE_SIZE) * ceil(size_y / tile_size)  reads.
Each thread reads 7 values, and there are BLOCK_SIZE * BLOCK_SIZE * ceil(size_x / TILE_SIZE) * ceil(size_y / TILE_SIZE) threads.
If you already had a working convolution code, how could you use it to implement this stencil?
This code makes fewer accesses - the equivalent convolution code would load the values where the kernel is 0 on the corners.
